questions.question: Set on a winter island, this arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates' conflict with a corrupt royal family and a rebel army. What is...?
Set on a frozen island, this arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates and the G-5 marines against a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This arc features a deadly game run by a Warlord of the Sea on an island in the New World. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Blackbeard Pirates, allows the user to create and manipulate darkness. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, involves using the cold of the underworld to freeze opponents. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability gives its user the power to create and manipulate strings. What is...?
This character, the captain of the Heart Pirates and a key ally of the Straw Hat Pirates, is known for his surgical skills and the Ope Ope no Mi Devil Fruit. Who is...?
This character, a former member of the Roger Pirates and known for his light-light fruit powers, played a significant role in the Void Century. Who is...?
This new character, introduced in the Wano Country arc, is known for their claim to be the son of Kaido and for their mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit. Who is...?
